name: Arcade Game 01: Balloon Collector
description:
#arcade #platformer #retro

"Welcome to my first game called, "Arcade Game 01 - Balloon Collector".

Collect as many balloons as you can in each different levels and unlock a special reward."

This game contains:

"4 Playable Balloon Characters" that you can play".

"20 Levels of "Balloon Collecting Fun", and ...........................

"Few different secrets to discover".

( "Reminder: This game wasn't designed for everyone to play and enjoy. It's designed for revealing private information from a person they do not know. And you must leave this one out, just in case." )

(FINAL UPDATE: "The game update is here,  have fun playing it and hope you'll like it"!!)

(Version 2.0.1)

Last Game Update: I've actually re-designed this game with a few additions, such as:

"Re-polished the Visual Design, again"..........(:(

"Added some "Loading" and "Reminder" screen but this one is kinda, weird"......................

"Re-edited and added some of my own original music compositions, so yeah"!!

"Fixed the dialogue box in the "Intro" screen of the game".

"Also, fixed the bug where the balloon score count changes to a random number when pausing the game".

"And lastly, added a second extra mode in Extras Menu, but you'll need to access it on your own" (it has a limit though, so I'll plan that out soon)...................

("I won't be updating this game anymore because of more game projects that I'm planning on releasing"..........)

(ANOTHER NOTE TO THE GAME: "This game doesn't have any kind of viruses, so you can play it though.")

(LAST NOTE: "This game isn't affiliated with any random "Game Jams" because I've wanted my game to be played by you guys without competing in any sorts of challenges. It's just for fun, obviously")
